bikes.Name: Standard Bike
bikes.Descr:
Scott or Avanti mountain bike
29er Aluminium alloy frame 27 spd Shimano Alivio or Acera
Front suspension fork(sprung) RockShox XC28 or Suntour XCM
Hydraulic Disc brake Shimano M395
Weight 15 kg
Suits Riders(150 - 200)

bikes.Name: Premium Bike
bikes.Descr:
Avanti Competitor 27.5
Aluminium alloy frame
Shimano Deore 2x10spd
Front suspension Rockshox 30 Gold Solo Air
Shimano M425 Hydraulic Disc
Weight 12.5kg

bikes.Name: Full Suspension Bike
bikes.Descr:
Hammerhead 29er Aluminium alloy frame
2x10spd SRAM X5 X7 groupset
Rockshox Pike 140 mm fork
Fox CTD Kashima Rear Shock
Shimano Deore hydraulic brakes
SRAM Roam 30 wheels
Weight 14 kg

bikes.Name: Electric Bike
bikes.Descr:
Pedal and throttle power assist
70-100km battery range
Powerful 36V12Ah battery
Front rear lights Low step thru frame
Charger supplied with multi-day hires
